exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable decA.

original: destruct (nat2Zp_surj x) as [n [Hn Hx]]. rewrite Hx. apply nodup_In. assert (Hn': (Z.of_nat n <> 0)%Z) by (apply (ZifyClasses.rew_iff (n <> 0) (Z.of_nat n <> 0)%Z); auto). apply (count_occ_In _ _ _). assert (Hp_lt: n < p) by apply Hn. apply (div_rem_spec2 n p Hp) in Hp_lt as Hrem_lt. enough (Hrem: rem n p < p) by omega. apply rem_lt; auto. contradict Hx. rewrite nat2Zp_zero. rewrite <- rem_diag; auto.
